bug.short_desc: In Cinnamon 3.4.0, UK English panel menus show German for 'Remove'.
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
After updating cinnamon to 3.4.0, the panel context menus for UK English read 'entfernen' (German) instead of 'remove'.
Example: Right-click on 'Menu' and instead of 'Remove Menu', we have 'Menu entfernen'
Cinnamon 3.2.8 was correct - error was introduced in 3.4.0.
